channel.title: RuneScape Glitches (Part 2)
channel.description:
Well, my RuneScape membership just ran out, so I had nothing else better to do.
[b]Introduction:[/b] This will teach you some interesting information that may and possibly could result in obtaining FREE Membership!
[b]Guide:[/b] Well, we all know that when subscribing to RuneScape Members', you have a variety of Payment options. The easiest of all options would be, [b]Pay by SMS[/b], and [b]Pay by Phone[/b]. If these two options are accounted for, then the user will not have to pay anything for the membership, but instead it'll just be added to the Phone's bill.
Now, if you choose to do an SMS Payment, you would only have to send a simple text message to RuneScape, and immediatley obtain a RuneScape Membership pin minutes afterwards. I was google searching, and I found that are some FREE SMS Services out there. (This just simply means that a website is allowing you to text message for free). So, if you were to Choose Pay by SMS, and then use a Free SMS Service to make the text message to send to Jagex, then you would get a FREE Membership Pen, sent directly back to your account of the SMS Website. Instead of it charging you, the website will be charged!
Discuss your ideas, and weather or not I should further this idea.

I just never use it.

Runescape ofc, FunOrb has no use to me.

item.dc:creator: @tyttty tyttty
item.description:
@tyttty wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:6, topic:367860”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=464006.msg3393916#msg3393916 date=1289163342]
So is there a 2 way txting service for free?
[/quote]Jailbroken/non-jailbroken iPhones/iPods.
TextPlus, TextFree, and many more.

But, I get free membership for all JaGeX games/services, so I honestly don’t care.

I just don’t play their games, with the exception of the occasional FunOrb visit.[/quote]

my bs meter is jumping
